tokens.text: defines the identifier for a client biome

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Description
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Contains non-component settings for a Client Biome.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of the Client Biome, used by other features like the '/locate biome' command. Must match the name of a Biome defined by the game or a behavior pack.
